price: 135 Mais chaque fois que Nous mettions fin pour un temps à leurs souffrances, ils trahissaient leur engagement.
arabic: فَلَمَّا كَشَفۡنَا عَنۡهُمُ ٱلرِّجۡزَ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٍ هُم بَٰلِغُوهُ إِذَا هُمۡ يَنكُثُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: falammā kashafnā ʿanhumu al-rij'za ilā ajalin hum bālighūhu idhā hum yankuthūna
